short_description: When the sun sets, you die. A first-person narrative adventure set on a desolate shoreline where your life is determined by how much sun light there is left. You awaken amidst shipwrecks and shadows of shattered past dreams. You have one hour to reach a distant lighthouse of hope...or die.
